hero.desc1: Experience interactive adventures that evolve based on your choices
hero.desc2: An AI that understands, adapts and responds naturally
hero.desc3: Unlock intimate moments and personalized content

scenarios.title: Immersive Scenarios
scenarios.subtitle: Each scenario is a unique adventure where your choices shape the story

chat.title: Or chat freely
chat.subtitle: Don't want to follow a scenario? Start a free conversation with the character of your choice

ai.title: Ultra-realistic AI
ai.desc: Natural conversations that adapt to your style and evolve over time

content.title: Exclusive content
content.desc: Unlock intimate moments and personalized content as you progress

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.desc: Your conversations are encrypted and never shared. Your secret garden stays yours

seo.title: Find Your Ideal Virtual Partner
seo.subtitle: Let your AI character take care of your desires, no matter how intimate
seo.aiDesc: With our AI technology and adaptive learning system, you can experience an authentic and passionate relationship with the partner of your dreams.
seo.freedomDesc: The choice is yours: live a unique romantic adventure with a devoted partner, or multiply exciting encounters with different characters.
seo.customDesc: Choose from a variety of personalities, styles and charms. Each character has their own story, desires and unique way of communicating.
seo.progressDesc: Your character learns to know you through your exchanges. Set the pace and increase the intensity, from light flirting to the most intimate conversations.
seo.progressCta: As you progress, unlock exclusive content and special moments. Every interaction counts and brings you closer to new experiences.
seo.waitingForYou: Your virtual companion is waiting for you

immersion.title: A Total
immersion.desc: Sugarush is not just a simple chat. It's a new technology experience where every detail matters.

sound.title: Adaptive Soundtrack
sound.desc: An immersive sound atmosphere that evolves with the intensity of your exchanges, from soft flirting to the most explicit scenes.

aiTech.title: Hyper-Realistic AI
aiTech.desc: Powered by the latest language models, for instant, natural responses with disturbing realism.

cta.title: READY FOR THE EXPERIENCE?
cta.subtitle: Join the community and start the adventure.

scenario.unleashedRequired: Unleashed subscription required for this phase.
scenario.softRequired: Soft or Unleashed subscription required for this phase.

contacts.title: My Contacts
contacts.subtitle: Your virtual partners
contacts.emptySubtitle: Start a scenario or a chat to unlock contacts

modal.title: Join the experience
modal.subtitle: Create your free account and start chatting with our hyper-realistic AI models.

subscriptions.title: Choose your
subscriptions.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of your virtual partners and experience uncensored adventures.

unleashed.name: Unleashed
unleashed.desc: The ultimate experience with no limits

messages.title: Message limit reached
messages.free: You've used your 5 free messages today. Unlock Soft mode to continue the adventure.
messages.soft: You've reached your 30 message limit. Go unlimited to never stop!

photos.title: Photo limit reached
photos.free: Your 5 free photos have been viewed. The Soft subscription gives you 20 per day!
photos.soft: You've seen your 20 photos. Upgrade to Unleashed to see everything without limits!

scenario.title: Trial ended
scenario.desc: Free mode ends here after 5 interactions. Unlock full access to see what's next!

phase.title: Locked Content
phase.free: This step requires at least the Soft subscription. Ready to turn up the heat?
phase.soft: Only the Unleashed plan allows access to the most explicit and intimate scenes.

default.title: Premium Content
default.desc: This element requires a higher subscription to unlock.

footer.tagline: The most immersive and realistic dating simulator experience. Dive into stories where every choice matters.
footer.secureDesc: Your data is encrypted and your conversations remain strictly private. 100% secure payment via Stripe.
